{{Flavour|The weirdly-patterned scaly skin of a mottled dragon. It may be turned into proper armour by magical means. Its smooth surface lets sticky flames flow off it like water.}}

'''Mottled dragon hide''' is a light suit of body [[armour]] (only slightly heavier than [[leather armour]]) that provides resistance to [[Sticky Flame]]. It can occasionally be obtained by butchering a [[mottled dragon]] [[corpse]]. Enchanting it with [[scroll of enchant armour]] turns it into a much more useful [[mottled dragon armour]].

==History==
In [[0.19]], mottled dragon hide, along with all other hides, was removed.
